EmailTemplate.description: This template is to send set password email for the Fleetguard users
EmailTemplate.name: IAM_Fleetguard_Setpassword
EmailTemplate.subject: Fleetguard Online Account Created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cummins
The Username for your Cummins account is {!Receiving_User.Username}
Please click the link below to set the password for your account.

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINSâ„¢ or your Cummins account representative. Thank you for your interest in customer.
